ind:sql57_test.comment: Ensure 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries' is set to '0'
Ensure 'CLR Enabled' is set to '0'
Ensure 'Cross DB Ownership Chaining' is set to '0'
Ensure 'Database Mail XPs' is set to '0'
Ensure 'Ole Automation Procedures' is set to '0'
Ensure 'remote access' in use is set to 0
Ensure 'remote access' is configured to '0'
Ensure 'Remote Admin Connections' is set to '0'
Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' in use is set to '0'
Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' is configured to '0'
Ensure 'Trustworthy' is set to 'Off'
Ensure TcpPort is not equal to 1433
Ensure Hide Instance option is 1
Ensure 'is_disabled' for the 'sa' account is set to '1'
Ensure sid 0x01 is not named sa
Ensure sid 0x01 is not named 'rdsa'
Ensure 'xp_cmdshell' is configured to '0'
Ensure 'xp_cmdshell' in use is set to '0'
Ensure auto_close is off for contained databases
Ensure no login exists with the name sa
Ensure 'IsIntegratedSecurityOnly' is set to '1'
Ensure no extra permissions granted to public
Ensure no Builtin groups are logins
Ensure Windows local groups are not SQL Logins
Ensure the public role in the msdb database is not granted access to SQL Agent proxies
Ensure Check_Expiration is ON for High Privilege Logins
Ensure Check_Policy is ON for all SQL Authenticated Logins
Ensure number of error logs is greater than or equal to 12
Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' is configured to '1'
Ensure the 'Default Trace Enabled' value in use '1'
Ensure audit level is failure or all
Ensure Audit_Change_Group is part of an audit
Ensure Failed_Login_Group is part of an audit
Ensure Successful_Login_Group is part of an audit
Ensure 'CLR Assembly Permission Set' is set to 'SAFE_ACCESS' for All CLR Assemblies

ind:sql57_object.ind:sql: SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'clr enabled';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'cross db ownership chaining';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Database Mail XPs';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Ole Automation Procedures';
SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'remote access';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'remote access';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'remote admin connections' AND SERVERPROPERTY('IsClustered') = 0;
SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'scan for startup procs';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'scan for startup procs';
SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE is_trustworthy_on = 1 AND name != 'msdb';
BEGIN EXEC master.sys.xp_instance_regread N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', N'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQLServer\SuperSocketNetLib\Tcp\IPAll', N'TcpPort'; END
BEGIN EXEC master.sys.xp_instance_regread @rootkey = N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', @key = N'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQLServer\SuperSocketNetLib', @value_name = N'HideInstance'; END
SELECT name, is_disabled FROM sys.server_principals WHERE sid = 0x01;
SELECT name FROM sys.server_principals WHERE sid = 0x01;
SELECT name FROM sys.server_principals WHERE sid = 0x01;
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'xp_cmdshell';
SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'xp_cmdshell';
SELECT 1 FROM sys.databases WHERE containment <> 0 and is_auto_close_on = 1;
SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_principals WHERE name = 'sa';
SELECT SERVERPROPERTY('IsIntegratedSecurityOnly') as "login_mode";

SELECT 1 FROM master.sys.server_permissions WHERE (grantee_principal_id = SUSER_SID(N'public') and state_desc LIKE 'GRANT%') AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'VIEW ANY DATABASE' and class_desc = 'SERVER') AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 2) AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 3) AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 4) AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 5);
SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_principals pr JOIN sys.server_permissions pe ON pr.principal_id = pe.grantee_principal_id WHERE pr.name like 'BUILTIN%';

SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_principals pr JOIN sys.server_permissions pe ON pr.[principal_id] = pe.[grantee_principal_id] WHERE pr.[type_desc] = 'WINDOWS_GROUP' AND pr.[name] like CAST(SERVERPROPERTY('MachineName') AS nvarchar) + '%';
SELECT 1 FROM msdb.dbo.sysproxylogin spl JOIN msdb.sys.database_principals dp ON dp.sid = spl.sid JOIN msdb.dbo.sysproxies sp ON sp.proxy_id = spl.proxy_id WHERE principal_id = USER_ID('public');

SELECT 1 FROM sys.sql_logins AS l WHERE IS_SRVROLEMEMBER('sysadmin',name) = 1 AND l.is_expiration_checked <> 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM sys.sql_logins AS l JOIN sys.server_permissions AS p ON l.principal_id = p.grantee_principal_id WHERE p.type = 'CL' AND p.state IN ('G', 'W') AND l.is_expiration_checked <> 1;
SELECT 1 FROM sys.sql_logins WHERE is_policy_checked = 0;

BEGIN DECLARE @NumErrorLogs int; EXEC master.sys.xp_instance_regread N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE',N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\MSSQLServer',N'NumErrorLogs',@NumErrorLogs OUTPUT; SELECT ISNULL(@NumErrorLogs, -1) AS [numberoflogfiles]; END
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'default trace enabled';
SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'default trace enabled';
BEGIN exec xp_loginconfig 'audit level'; END

SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_audit_specification_details AS SAD JOIN sys.server_audit_specifications AS SA ON SAD.server_specification_id = SA.server_specification_id JOIN sys.server_audits AS S ON SA.audit_guid = S.audit_guid WHERE SAD.audit_action_id = 'CNAU' AND S.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SA.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SAD.audited_result = 'SUCCESS AND FAILURE';

SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_audit_specification_details AS SAD JOIN sys.server_audit_specifications AS SA ON SAD.server_specification_id = SA.server_specification_id JOIN sys.server_audits AS S ON SA.audit_guid = S.audit_guid WHERE SAD.audit_action_id = 'LGFL' AND S.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SA.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SAD.audited_result = 'SUCCESS AND FAILURE';

SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_audit_specification_details AS SAD JOIN sys.server_audit_specifications AS SA ON SAD.server_specification_id = SA.server_specification_id JOIN sys.server_audits AS S ON SA.audit_guid = S.audit_guid WHERE SAD.audit_action_id = 'LGSD' AND S.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SA.is_state_enabled = 1 AND SAD.audited_result = 'SUCCESS AND FAILURE';
SELECT name, permission_set_desc FROM sys.assemblies where is_user_defined = 1;

external_variable.comment: SQL connection string
Ensure 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries' is set to '0'
Ensure 'CLR Enabled' is set to '0'
Ensure 'Cross DB Ownership Chaining' is set to '0'
Ensure 'Database Mail XPs' is set to '0'
Ensure 'Ole Automation Procedures' is set to '0'
Ensure 'remote access' in use is set to 0
Ensure 'remote access' is configured to '0'
Ensure 'Remote Admin Connections' is set to '0'
Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' in use is set to '0'
Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' is configured to '0'
Ensure TcpPort is not equal to 1433
Ensure Hide Instance option is 1
Ensure 'is_disabled' for the 'sa' account is set to '1'
Ensure sid 0x01 is not named sa
Ensure sid 0x01 is not named 'rdsa'
Ensure 'xp_cmdshell' is configured to '0'
Ensure 'xp_cmdshell' in use is set to '0'
Ensure 'IsIntegratedSecurityOnly' is set to '1'
Ensure number of error logs is greater than or equal to 12
Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' is configured to '1'
Ensure the 'Default Trace Enabled' value in use '1'
Ensure audit level is failure or all
Ensure 'CLR Assembly Permission Set' is set to 'SAFE_ACCESS' for All CLR Assemblies
